features: - Added QR Code generator functionaluty. What is a QR Code generator? It is a niche tool that is used to generate different types of QR Codes. Depending on your purpose, you can use our generator to create QR Codes to open a website, view a PDF file, listen to music, watch Youtube videos, store image files, connect to a WiFi network, and much more

- Added IMG-TO-URL functionaluty. This is a free image hosting service. It allows photographers to upload and share images from their online databases. After you have uploaded photos, you can access them from anywhere in the world, as long as you have internet and a browser.
- Added Buy Me A Coffee ( Donate System )
- Added Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

- This web-app made for portfolio. ShortURL is a link management platform that lets you harness the power of your links by shortening, sharing, managing and analyzing links to your content. Billions of links are created every year by our millions of users, from individuals to small businesses to Fortune 500 companies
